title: Torneo League of Legends 5vs5 #2

embed.description: ThumbleCrash.com are proud to present the#2 International ThumbleCrash Tournament Series. All teams must be registered on ThumbleCrash Platform and RIOT Event Page. If you want to play but you don't have a Team, you can use our Recruiting Platform inside ThumbleCrash eSports Platform.

body:
Thumblecrash è orgogliosa di presentare il secondo torneo internazionale sulla prima piattaforma Italiana dedicata al mondo degli eSports.
Alcune delle informazioni sul torneo:

**The structure of the tournament:**
End registration: 08 October 2016 @ 17:30 UTC (19:30 Italian time)
Check-In Start: 08 October 2016 @ 17:31 UTC (19:31 Italian time)
Check-In End: 08 October 2016 @ 18:30 UTC (20:30 Italian time)
Tournament Start Date: 08 October 2016 @ 19:00 UTC (21:00 Italian time)
ThumbleCrash registration page: [Click Here](https://play.thumblecrash.com/Tournament/Detail/18)
Riot Registration Page: [Click Here](http://events.euw.leagueoflegends.com/events/219082)
Maximum number of teams: 16
Type game: 5 vs 5 ([players must register as a team](https://thumblecrash.com/how-to-create-team-thumblecrash-esports/))
Tournament type: Single Elimination
Map: Summoner’s Rift
The best of: 1 (game)
Tournament structure: single elimination (see [Bracket structure](https://thumblecrash.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/bracket-example-8-teams.jpg))
Tournament rules: [click here](https://thumblecrash.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/thumblecrash-league-of_legends-tournament-riot-event-en_GB.pdf)

**Tournament Prizes:**
First Place
 1600 RP, Ryze, Triumphant Ryze, 4-Win IP Boost, 50 ThumbleCrash Coins, 50 Tournament Points
Second Place
 1200 RP, 4-Win IP Boost, 25 ThumbleCrash Coins, 25 Tournament Points
Third Place
 800 RP, 4-WIN IP Boost, 10 ThumbleCrash Coins, 10 Tournament Points
Fourth Place
 400 RP, 4-Win IP Boost
From Fifth Place to Eighth Place
 4-Win IP Boost

Per maggiori informazioni contattatemi.
